weekly_top_story.headline: White House Delays Rollout of New Healthcare Cost Plan Amid Expiring ACA Subsidies
weekly_top_story.summary: The White House has delayed the announcement of a new healthcare cost plan as Affordable Care Act subsidies expire, raising concerns about affordability and access for millions of Americans.

stories.headline: CMS Releases CY 2027 Medicare Advantage and Part D Proposed Rule
stories.summary: CMS has released the proposed rule for Medicare Advantage and Part D for 2027, which could significantly impact reimbursement, plan design, and patient access to medications.

stories.headline: Trump Administration Announces Negotiated Drug Prices for 2027
stories.summary: The Trump Administration has announced new negotiated drug prices for 2027, which may affect medication affordability and pharmacy reimbursement rates.

stories.headline: Senate Finance Committee Holds Hearing on Rising Cost of Health Care
stories.summary: The Senate Finance Committee held a hearing to address the rising cost of health care, focusing on systemic drivers and potential legislative solutions.
